column4: anyone had the problem of sound coming from speakers and headphones?
I actually like it if there´s sound from these devices, that´s what they are for, isn´t it?
install alsamixer where you can set sound levels for headphones and speaker individually

if I mute the speakers, it mutes everything, if I unmute my system it then begins playing through the speakers and headphones again. I read about Heaphone Jack Sensing, but I haven't been able to find anything on my computer about it, or in alsamixer
